Diff between zkRollup (e.g. @zksync) and Validium (e.g. StarkEx) explained. TL;DR:   zkRollup holds data on-chain. Secure if at least one Ethereum full node exists.  Validum keeps data off-chain. Secure if at least 1 of n permissioned data notaries is honest.
